name: Spinoff (itch)
description:
Spinoff was an attempt at creating a smaller game that would take less time to make. I was inspired by Stickfighters: The Game from Landfall Games that feature short multiplayer battles that start moments after the last one is finished. No highscore list or loading screen: just on to the next match. 

Follow me on Twitter: @MarcusKaraker
Music by A Drop A Day
